entry.title: ğŸ‰ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a â­ï¸

entry.title: Chord
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š2,99Â â‚¬ â†’ 1,99Â â‚¬ [0,29Â â‚¬ ~ 2,99Â â‚¬]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼š1,99Â â‚¬

Application Description

This app plus your ears equals complete freedom in writing music! A comprehensive set of tools for any musician: * Chord Progression: Create beautiful chord progressions with full flexibility - use inversions, sus2, sus4, 7th, 9th, and more. Enjoy live playback as piano or synth, or send MIDI directly to your macOS computer! * MIDI Keyboard: Transform your phone into a MIDI keyboard for your macOS computer (compatible with macOS Catalina and newer). * Notation Practice: Practice reading notes in both treble and bass clefs. * Chord Calculation: Help you learn how to calculate chords and progressions. * Interval Practice: Practice recognizing and comparing musical intervals by ear. * Voice & Ear Training: Simple, effective tools for voice practice and ear training. Plus, enjoy the macOS version included with your purchase!

Application Screenshot

iPad

entry.title: Dead Cells
entry.content:

All Price Information

Compras integradas

  • The Bad Seedï¼š3,99Â â‚¬
  • Fatal Fallsï¼š3,99Â â‚¬
  • DLC QUEEN AND THE SEAï¼š3,99Â â‚¬
  • Retorno a Castlevaniaï¼š7,99Â â‚¬

Application Description

A morte nÃ£o Ã© o fim. Jogue como um experimento de alquimia fracassado e explore o extenso castelo em constante mudanÃ§a para descobrir o que aconteceu nesta ilha sombria ...! Isto Ã©, desde que vocÃª consiga passar pelos guardiÃµes. Dead Cells Ã© um jogo de aÃ§Ã£o em plataforma em estilo roguevania que exige que vocÃª domine combates frenÃ©ticos 2D com uma grande variedade de armas e habilidades contra inimigos impiedosos. Matar. Morrer. Aprender. Repetir. DisponÃ­vel inicialmente para PC e consoles, o sucesso indie Dead Cells agora estÃ¡ arrasando com os inimigos em dispositivos mÃ³veis! Principais CaracterÃ­sticas â€¢ Roguevania: A exploraÃ§Ã£o progressiva de um mundo interconectado, com a "rejogabilidade" do estilo rogue-lite e a adrenalina da ameaÃ§a de morte permanente â€¢ FrenÃ©tica AÃ§Ã£o 2D: Aprenda os padrÃµes de seus inimigos para se manter vivo ou prepare-se para ser enviado de volta Ã  sua cela antes que possa dizer "baguete" â€¢ ProgressÃ£o NÃ£o Linear: Desbloqueie novos nÃ­veis a cada morte, opte pelo caminho que mais se adequar ao seu personagem atual, ao seu estilo de jogo ou simplesmente ao seu estado de espÃ­rito. Certamente as muralhas nÃ£o vÃ£o ser tÃ£o perigosas quanto os esgotos, certo? â€¢ Jogue no seu ritmo - VocÃª vai explorar cada cantinho escuro do castelo, ou vai correr para o final? *As Ãºltimas atualizaÃ§Ãµes estÃ£o disponÃ­veis: Clean Cut & The End is Near* DLC RETORNO A CASTLEVANIA Ã‰ hora de caÃ§ar vampiros â€¢ Novo enredo - venÃ§a o Soberano das Trevas ao lado de Alucard e Richter Belmont, â€¢ 2 novos biomas - Explore o Castelo de DrÃ¡cula e as suas redondezas â€¢ 9 monstros novos - Lobisomens, armaduras assombradas e medusas esperam por vocÃª â€¢ 14 armas novas - empunhe a Matadora de Vampiros ou a Ãgua Benta para derrotar as criaturas da noite, â€¢ 3 novos chefes - vÃ¡ com unhas e dentes contra a Morte e o prÃ³prio DrÃ¡cula â€¢ 20 novas roupas - vista-se como seus personagens favoritos de Castlevania: Simon e Richter Belmont ou Alucard â€¢ Trilhas sonoras alternativas - jogue ao som de 51 trilhas sonoras originais de Castlevania e 12 mÃºsicas reimaginadas no estilo de Dead Cells AVISO: dispositivos com menos de 2 GB de RAM podem nÃ£o conseguir rodar este conteÃºdo corretamente. Recomendamos nÃ£o ficar com este DLC se o dispositivo estiver com menos de 2 GB de RAM. Recriado cuidadosamente para dispositivos mÃ³veis com uma interface renovada â€¢ Dois modos de jogo disponÃ­veis: Original e Autoataque â€¢ Controles personalizados e mais opÃ§Ãµes de controles de toque disponÃ­veis: Troque a posiÃ§Ã£o e o tamanho dos botÃµes como preferir, deslize para esquivar... â€¢ Suporte para controle externo MFi â€¢ Sem anÃºncios, sem mecÃ¢nicas F2P! Se encontrar um problema, entre em contato conosco pelo e-mail support@playdigious.mail.helpshift.com e forneÃ§a o mÃ¡ximo de informaÃ§Ã£o possÃ­vel sobre o problema.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Onyx Magic
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š79,99Â â‚¬ â†’ 69,99Â â‚¬ [59,99Â â‚¬ ~ 79,99Â â‚¬]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼š69,99Â â‚¬

Compras integradas

  • 100 Onyx Creditsï¼š29,99Â â‚¬

Application Description

Onyx is a revolutionary new utility that allows you to modify a captured image in real-time using variable input data. Using cutting edge AI processing, Onyx lets you remotely create seamless alterations to photos moments after they've been taken - all with your spectator's camera. For example: â€” Make a playing card appear in your spectator's wallet. â€” Morph your spectator's shadow to look like their thought of animal. â€” Take a photo of your spectator holding a signed card. They name *any* other card. The signed card in the photo transforms to match their thought. â€” Supplement your Gypsy Queen routine with Onyx, allowing you to zoom in on a photo of your spectator holding the Queen of Hearts for the reveal. â€” Reveal a thought-of word, name, or initials hidden naturally in the light reflections of a spectator's eye. â€” Change the time on a photo of a clock. â€” Remove your spectator's wristwatch in a photo, making it seem that it was removed earlier. ...and more! If you can describe it, Onyx can likely create it. Onyx is particularly great for a reveal within something ephemeral. Take a photo of someone's shadow, a landscape shot of the clouds, a flicker on a TV screen or more, and Onyx will realistically insert their free choice. * Variable Delayed Input Inspired by the popular variable trigger system featured in DFB X, Onyx pauses and automatically waits for input, letting you remotely modify a photo *after* it's been taken. * Cutting Edge Technology Take a photo, then have your spectator make a free choice. Onyx's advanced technology seamlessly transforms the photo remotely. * Create Unlimited Effects Change signed playing cards, reveal initials and names, or modify writing. Reveal *anything you can imagine* within a genuine photo you just took. * Your Integrations. Their Camera The effect happens entirely with the spectator's camera. With Onyx's powerful integrations, your phone never needs to leave your pocket. * Invisible, Advanced Technology As only the spectator's device is in play, Onyx's advanced technology remains hidden and inconspicuous. * Third Party Integrations Use your favourite magic apps' input methods, including: â€” Earworm's covert typing Web Search & Notes input â€” Native voice input â€” WebFX's Wrist Gestures â€” WikiTest â€” PeekSmith â€” Bridge ...and any compatible third-party app. Onyx is a tool specifically designed for entertainment purposes. It uses purchaseable in-app credits or a funded OpenRouter account for best-in-class automatic edits. Onyx supports: Arabic, Bengali, Bulgarian, Chinese simplified and traditional, Croatian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, Estonian, Finnish, French, German, Greek, Hebrew, Hindi, Hungarian, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Latvian, Lithuanian, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Serbian, Slovak, Slovenian, Spanish, Swahili, Swedish, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese

All Price Information

Priceï¼šGratuito

Application Description

MagicKit AI â€“ Kit de Ferramentas Tudo-em-Um para o Seu Dispositivo O MagicKit AI Ã© um aplicativo utilitÃ¡rio completo, projetado para ajudÃ¡-lo a monitorar seu dispositivo, otimizar o desempenho e acessar ferramentas do dia a dia em uma interface prÃ¡tica. Desenvolvido especialmente para iOS, o MagicKit AI reÃºne funcionalidades essenciais enquanto protege sua privacidade e economiza bateria. Ferramentas do Dispositivo e do Sistema â€¢ Status da Bateria: Veja o nÃ­vel de carga e o estado atual da bateria â€¢ Uso de Armazenamento: Analise o espaÃ§o usado e disponÃ­vel â€¢ InformaÃ§Ãµes do Dispositivo: Verifique detalhes do hardware e do sistema â€¢ Tempo de Atividade: Monitore hÃ¡ quanto tempo o dispositivo estÃ¡ ligado â€¢ Dicas de Bateria: Receba conselhos Ãºteis para melhorar o uso da bateria â€¢ Limpeza de Fotos: Detecte e remova fotos duplicadas ou semelhantes â€¢ Limpeza de Contatos: Organize contatos removendo duplicatas e entradas incompletas â€¢ Gerenciador de RAM: Monitore o uso da memÃ³ria e otimize o desempenho â€¢ Teste de Benchmark: Avalie o desempenho de CPU, GPU, memÃ³ria e rede Ferramentas de Rede â€¢ Teste de Velocidade: MeÃ§a a velocidade da conexÃ£o com a internet â€¢ InformaÃ§Ãµes do Wi-Fi: Veja nome da rede, IP e status da conexÃ£o â€¢ Consulta de IP: Verifique a geolocalizaÃ§Ã£o de endereÃ§os IP pÃºblicos â€¢ InformaÃ§Ãµes de LocalizaÃ§Ã£o: Acompanhe GPS, velocidade, direÃ§Ã£o e altitude SeguranÃ§a e Privacidade â€¢ Gerador de Senhas: Crie senhas fortes e seguras com opÃ§Ãµes personalizÃ¡veis â€¢ Gerador de Frases de Acesso: Crie frases memorÃ¡veis e seguras â€¢ Gerador de UUID: Crie identificadores Ãºnicos em vÃ¡rios formatos â€¢ Gerador de PIN Seguro: Gere cÃ³digos PIN seguros com vÃ¡rias opÃ§Ãµes â€¢ E-mail TemporÃ¡rio: Crie e-mails descartÃ¡veis para proteger sua privacidade Ferramentas UtilitÃ¡rias â€¢ Conversor de Unidades: Converta entre diferentes unidades de medida â€¢ Conversor de Moeda e Cripto: Veja taxas de cÃ¢mbio em tempo real para moedas e criptomoedas â€¢ Calculadora de Datas: Calcule diferenÃ§as entre datas com suporte para dias Ãºteis â€¢ Conversor de Fuso HorÃ¡rio: Converta horÃ¡rios com atualizaÃ§Ãµes ao vivo e suporte a horÃ¡rio de verÃ£o â€¢ Contagem Regressiva e Lembretes: Crie contagens regressivas personalizadas com lembretes e eventos recorrentes â€¢ Contador MÃ¡gico: Acompanhe mÃºltiplos contadores com estatÃ­sticas e sequÃªncias â€¢ Leitor de QR Code: Escaneie cÃ³digos QR instantaneamente â€¢ Scanner de Documentos e CartÃµes: Capture e salve digitalizaÃ§Ãµes com reconhecimento de texto via IA â€¢ BÃºssola e NÃ­vel: MeÃ§a direÃ§Ã£o e nÃ­vel usando os sensores do dispositivo â€¢ Travar OrientaÃ§Ã£o: Trave a orientaÃ§Ã£o da tela ao usar o app â€¢ Medidor de Ãudio: MeÃ§a nÃ­veis de som ao redor com o microfone â€¢ Gerenciador de Ãrea de TransferÃªncia: Acesse e gerencie textos copiados durante a sessÃ£o â€¢ Lanterna e Brilho: Ative a lanterna e ajuste o brilho da tela â€¢ Bloco de Notas: Crie, organize e gerencie notas com categorias e backup no iCloud â€¢ Gerador Universal: Gere dados aleatÃ³rios como texto, nÃºmeros, datas e mais Destaques â€¢ Interface limpa e fÃ¡cil de usar com ferramentas assistidas â€¢ SeÃ§Ã£o de Ferramentas em Destaque com as mais populares â€¢ Sem anÃºncios ou compras no aplicativo â€¢ Leve e eficiente no uso de bateria â€¢ CompatÃ­vel com todos os dispositivos iOS â€¢ AtualizaÃ§Ãµes frequentes com novas ferramentas â€¢ Desenvolvido com foco em privacidade e desempenho â€¢ Suporte para tema claro/escuro com animaÃ§Ãµes suaves Perfeito para: â€¢ Monitorar e otimizar o dispositivo â€¢ MediÃ§Ãµes e conversÃµes do dia a dia â€¢ Escanear documentos e QR Codes â€¢ Limpar fotos e contatos duplicados â€¢ Criar lembretes e contagens regressivas â€¢ Acompanhar hÃ¡bitos e progresso â€¢ Acessar ferramentas rÃ¡pidas como lanterna e brilho â€¢ DiagnÃ³sticos bÃ¡sicos de rede â€¢ Criar senhas seguras e manter a privacidade â€¢ Tomar notas rÃ¡pidas e organizadas Baixe o MagicKit AI hoje mesmo e simplifique suas tarefas diÃ¡rias com um kit inteligente e poderoso.

entry.title: Cyber Manhunt
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š5,99Â â‚¬ â†’ 2,99Â â‚¬ [2,99Â â‚¬ ~ 5,99Â â‚¬]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼š2,99Â â‚¬

Compras integradas

  • Hello World!ï¼š0,99Â â‚¬
  • Home Sweet Homeï¼š0,99Â â‚¬

Application Description

Cyber Manhunt is a Cyber-Style, Realistic- Society theme, Story-Rich indie game. The game taked place in the Republic of Alivia with some different theme stories ,but the fate of the characters is closely related in there. It will focus on social issues liking big data, hacking, citizen privacy etc... We want to reveal the profound themes behind the stories with wonderful plots and gamification. And let players pay more attention to Cyber Violence and Privacy Breaches. [Contents] â—†Chapter I: Death of a Programmer The CEO of a company committed suicide by jumping off a building, and claimed that he was extorted tens of millions by his wife. While his wife posted photos of domestic violence on social networks. Who is lying? â—†Chapter II: Invisible Eyes The indecent video of the female college student went viral on the Internet. At this moment, she was already socially dead. Who is the initiator? Who should protect the safety of women? â—†Chapter III: The Evidence Vanishes The student council president, who is both excellent in character and study, suddenly disappeared. The bullying incident made the case more complicated. Who is the murderer and who is the victim? â—†Chapter IV: The Price of Humiliation The female singer has been exposed again! Threatening letters, hype, the suicide of former girl group members... The Internet has set off a public opinion carnival again! â—†Chapter V: Immortal Code When the society is in madness, are you willing to join the Immortal Code to obtain true love and immortality? â—†DLC: Home Sweet Home Behind this seemingly sweet and happy family, everyone has their own secrets, what is the truth hidden behind?! â—†DLC: Hello World! Senior researcher of Titan Dr. Lucrezia died in a terrible car accident on the spot, but the fellow Benjamin took escape from death. But he did not realize that he was about to be involved in a huge conspiracyâ€¦ [Features] â—†Highly Immersive: Gamers play as a hacker in the game, accepts the commission of the company, and solve dangerous incidents. â—†Rich Gameplay: There are lots of features of Social Engineering in the game, which is including Detecting, Tracking, Puzzles-Solving, Destroying and Hacking etc.. â—†Wonderful Plots: Each chapter in the game will reflect a current hot social topic, such as: Sneak Shot, Cyber Violence, School Bullying, etc... â—†Multiple Roles: There are many different roles in this game with a flash of personality. Their stories would be dug by yourself. â—†Fully Dubbing: All the characters in the game have their own voice actors that make the game experience more immersive. â—†Original Music: There are some original songs in the game, and the lyrics and vocals are all completed by the studio. [Gameplay] â—†Web Search: You should collect basic information about the targets through the Internet search. â—†Database: You can use the database to get deep information about targets. â—†Crack: You would get passwords based on the obtained target's information, and use it to log in to accounts of different platforms. â—†Chat: The exciting thing is that you need to chat with targets by disguise and use the information to get the trust of the target. â—†Phishing: You can send phishing links to hack the targets' hardware devices, and get private information. â—†Picture Analysis: You can get valuable information and relevant clues from pictures. More advanced hacking methods will be unlocked later!

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Walden - Calendar/ToDo/Notes
entry.content:
Discount Information

Compras integradas

  • Lifetime Membershipï¼š14,99Â â‚¬ â†’ 9,99Â â‚¬ [8,99Â â‚¬ ~ 14,99Â â‚¬]

All Price Information

Priceï¼šGratuito

Compras integradas

  • Quarterly Membershipï¼š2,99Â â‚¬
  • Lifetime - Educationï¼š9,99Â â‚¬
  • å¹´åº¦ä¼šå‘˜å‡çº§ç»ˆèº«ä¼šå‘˜ï¼š9,99Â â‚¬
  • Yearly Membershipï¼š3,99Â â‚¬
  • Monthly Membershipï¼š0,99Â â‚¬
  • å¹´åº¦ä¼šå‘˜ï¼š3,99Â â‚¬
  • æœˆåº¦ä¼šå‘˜ï¼š0,99Â â‚¬
  • Lifetime Membershipï¼š9,99Â â‚¬

Application Description

Walden is an App focused on personal management, carefully designed to bring users only a quality experience, hope you like it. Function Introduction To-Do List Integrate the four quadrants of work, according to the priority of the task rational scheduling. Support repeat schedule and reminders. Pomodoro Walden's built-in tomato clock is designed strictly according to the tomato work method You can set daily tomato clock goals, rest time, and select the tasks to focus on from the to-do list Progress Management Quantify your goals, support goal grouping and progress notes, with a simple and beautiful progress bar, clearly track your goal progress. Flash Notes Integrate custom tags, support full-text search and display by tags. In our daily life, there will always be a moment of light and whimsy, it can be the emotion after reading a text, it can be the resonance of listening to a song, or simply want to record the moment's thoughts. If you are like me and want to practice writing long articles, then you can start by writing a paragraph every day and gradually improve your writing skills day by day. ----------------- Subscription Instructions --Subscription period: 1 month, 1 year (non-automatic renewal, please feel free to purchase) -- Payment: Payment will be deducted through the user's iTunes account, and payment will be made once the user confirms the purchase. --User Terms: http://freelancer-x.com/app-terms/ -- Privacy Policy: http://freelancer-x.com/app-privacy-policy/

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad
